CustomField.description: ... describes if the referenced certificate could be validated / verified. Only B2C Client IDs with valid certificates can be used to request AuthTokens from the B2C Commerce Account Manager.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ... describes if the referenced certificate could be validated / verified. Only B2C Client IDs with valid certificates can be used to request AuthTokens from the B2C Commerce Account Manager.
CustomField.label: Is Certificate Verified
